articles.title: Market Week Ahead: Gold Regains $2k, GBP/USD, EUR/USD Rally as USD Slides - DailyFX
articles.description: Central bank policy decisions and guidance help to stoke price action this week, while next week’s busy economic calendar could give markets a final pre-Christmas burst of volatility.

articles.title: Bank of Japan expected to stick with negative interest rates - Financial Times
articles.description: BoJ likely to signal its monetary plans at policy meeting on Tuesday but to hold off on action
articles.content: Investors are widely expecting the Bank of Japan to hold off on lifting negative interest rates on Tuesday, but governor Kazuo Ueda is likely to map out more clearly its monetary policy plans followi… [+4175 chars]
